mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM vacation_request WHERE vacation_ok = 1 AND CURDATE() BETWEEN vacation_start_day AND vacation_end_day

SELECT V.`vacation_id`, V.`member_no`, V.`vacation_kind`, V.`vacation_reason`, V.`vacation_start_day`, V.`vacation_end_day`, M.`member_name`, M.`member_class` FROM vacation_request V INNER JOIN member M ON V.member_no = M.member_no WHERE vacation_ok = 1 AND CURDATE() BETWEEN V.vacation_start_day AND V.vacation_end_day
